Description: Customer Identification Number in Credit Agricole
Name of program under car loans product
The date at which the loan should be closed (end of tenor)
Loan Amount that the customer takes
Remaining amount of the loan that is not paid yet at this reporting date
Number of unpaid installements at this reporting date
Customer's gender as per the national ID
Date of opening the relation with the customer (Can be before opening the loan)
Customer's birth date as per the national ID
